evening: After the pool we all had a shower and got read a special New Year’s Eve buffet dinner. When walks d around there was loads of different mouth watering foods like a seafood platter , all types of meat ,pho ,pastries , mousse and many more scrumptious foods.while we ate there was a singer who came in to sing some Vietnamese songs and English song with Vietnamese twist on the songs and after the host sang lots of song that he chose on the spot and songs people requested.The whole night my ears were filled with pounding beats of the music. At the end the end there was a raffle ,sadly none of my family or friends got it but funnily enough the number of the winning tickets was 67 and and 68.The whole night was filled with laughter , food and joy.
title: New Year’s Eve
afternoon: In the afternoon we were tired but hot,so we decided to go in to the pool. i[caitlyn] got to the pool first and ordered 3 shirley temble and some mouthwatering french fries with sauce. When the twins finally arrived  to the pool yeashara jumped in first and said “it was not cold at all” [spoiler it was freezing].So when i went in i was frozen to DEATH and shenara could luckily tell we were ice cold and only went in for 10 seconds
